column3: Good Downloaded to work on log functions, it easily met the purpose. Will rate again after I use more functions. For fellow users: sin(60= is always a error; try sin(60) instead. Remember to close the bracket after you enter the value).

Scientific Calculator is nice! Very user-friendly and easy to use Calculator, I like it. For those that complained of error In finding Sin, Cos,   tan and other, the error is from you; it is because you don't close the open bracket. Just try closing you won't get any error.
